how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing hair, remove excess water and apply evenly throughout hair. .-Leave on for two to three minutes..-Rinse..-Use one to two times per week in place of Flourish Conditioner for Thinning Hair (sold separately)...Tip: After applying, use the MANTAu00ae brush (sold separately), specially designed for fine, fragile hair and new growth, to comb through wet hair from root to end. This distributes the mask to each strand, hydrating and strengthening hair without weighing it down. Rinse, then use the MANTAu00ae to comb hair before styling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the price point considering it has silicones, which give the false appearance of looking healthy. Hair looks good for a day and then it reverts back to it's less pleasant state. Unfortunately I got this on december and haven't tried it until much later. Too late to return now. I had the false impression that it'd be more effective since it's very expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m starting my healthy hair growth journey. My hair doesnu2019t seem to grow fast at all and is on the thin/fine side. Iu2019ve been using this in my routine. Sometimes I donu2019t have a lot of time to let masks sit so I enjoy that this is only for 2-3 min.

reviews.review_title: Good for the price, wish it had a different scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good mask that has a nice texture which leaves my fine, thin hair so silky and soft. You get a good amount of product for the price. However, it smells strongly like Ajax scrub powder to me.
